metadata.name: Bitcoin Timeline Annotations
metadata.description: Key events in Bitcoin and related protocol history

annotations.label: Bitcoin Genesis
annotations.description: Bitcoin genesis block mined by Satoshi Nakamoto

annotations.label: P2MS Made Standard
annotations.description: P2MS multisig transactions became standard with Bitcoin Core v0.6.0 (BIP11), allowing nodes to relay and include them in blocks

annotations.label: Omni Launch
annotations.description: Omni protocol (originally Mastercoin) launched, pioneering the first layer protocol on Bitcoin for complex financial instruments

annotations.label: Counterparty Launch
annotations.description: Counterparty protocol went live on Bitcoin mainnet, enabling peer-to-peer financial applications and user-created tokens

annotations.label: Chancecoin Launch
annotations.description: Chancecoin launched as a decentralized gambling protocol on Bitcoin, using proof-of-burn and P2MS data carriage

annotations.label: Ordinals Launch
annotations.description: Ordinals protocol launched, enabling NFT-like inscriptions directly on Bitcoin

annotations.label: Bitcoin Stamps Launch
annotations.description: Bitcoin Stamps protocol launched in block 779,652, enabling immutable NFT storage via P2MS outputs with Key Burn addresses
